text: Rebecca Cremer (April 3, 1924 - April 20, 2006) was an American alpine skier. She competed in two events at the 1948 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2006 deaths Category:American female alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of the United States Category:Alpine skiers at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:People from Woodstock, Vermont Category:Sportspeople from Vermont
title: Rebecca Cremer
